TopicTitle: How To REALLY Get Angry At Space Science Deniers

Articles.Content:
On 05/06/2016 at 0:21 PM, RandomUser said:

Hah, that'd be pretty funny.  The sad thing being that they'd still continue to say that it is all Photoshop, or they'd just reiterate their nonsensical theory to fit more with what they'd seen.

A pancake Earth will look round from above too, so it would be pretty easy to maintain that you are looking at a flat Earth type object. As soon as you would make a full orbit, it becomes a little harder, but the human mind is a pliable thing.
I think even if they went suborbital they would have to see that the Earth is round, because as they moved east or west on their trajectory the Earth would still look round.

How not to get angry at conspiracy theorists:

1. Ignore them

2. Continue ignoring them

3. Go back to step 1, rinse and repeat.

 

It doesn't matter if you can prove them wrong. They're as ignorant as it gets. No matter what proof you bring up, they just dismiss it. So don't even bother spending your time with these guys. Go do some science instead.

 

It worked for me, anyways.
